topic.title: Freemasonry Secrets - be informed (help spread the world, please seed)
topic.body:
I know that some masons are hidden in ZeroNet and ready to send critics to me, but ZeroNet is the start of end of censure and capitalism, and isn't place for capitalists trying change the mind of revolutionary people.

Please read the content I'm preparing:

http://127.0.0.1:43110/1Mv5Di3gToYXzQBCcamFwL8562xSC1Dtzn

Please seed, I need update it.
